food_search_success.title: Found Food
food_search_success.description: You search through a dumpster behind a restaurant and discover some discarded but still edible food.

choices.text: Take the food and eat it now

outcomes.message: The food satisfies your hunger, though it's not the most hygienic meal.

choices.text: Take the food and save it for later

outcomes.message: You carefully pack the food away for when you might need it more.

choices.text: Leave it, it doesn't look safe

outcomes.message: Better safe than sorry. Your hunger remains, but at least you won't risk getting sick.

kind_stranger.title: Kind Stranger
kind_stranger.description: A passerby notices your situation and approaches with a sympathetic expression.

outcomes.message: They give you $5 and wish you well. The small kindness lifts your spirits.

choices.text: Ask if they could buy you a meal instead

outcomes.message: They take you to a nearby fast food place and buy you a meal. You feel much better.
You thank them but explain you'll be okay. They nod respectfully and continue on.

police_interaction.title: Police Interaction
police_interaction.description: A police officer approaches and asks you to move along from where you're resting.

outcomes.message: You gather your things and move elsewhere. It's tiring, but at least there's no trouble.

choices.text: Explain your situation and ask for resources

outcomes.message: The officer listens and provides information about a nearby shelter you weren't aware of.

choices.text: Argue that you have a right to be here

outcomes.message: The confrontation becomes tense. Eventually you have to move anyway, and now you're stressed.

bad_weather.title: Weather Turns Bad
bad_weather.description: The weather suddenly deteriorates. Rain begins to pour down heavily, and you need to find shelter quickly.

choices.text: Rush to the nearest overpass for cover

outcomes.message: You make it to an overpass just in time. It's not comfortable, but you stay relatively dry.

choices.text: Try to make it to a public building

outcomes.message: You get soaked before finding a library to dry off in. At least you're inside now.

choices.text: Use a tarp from your inventory

outcomes.message: You quickly create a makeshift shelter with your tarp. It's not perfect, but it keeps the worst of the rain off.

free_meal_program.title: Community Meal Program
free_meal_program.description: You notice a sign for a free community meal being served at a nearby church.

outcomes.message: You enjoy a hot meal and brief conversation with others. The volunteers are kind and non-judgmental.

choices.text: Volunteer to help in exchange for food

outcomes.message: You help serve others before eating yourself. The organizers appreciate your help and remember your face.
You decide not to attend and continue on your way.

theft_attempt.title: Theft Attempt
theft_attempt.description: While resting, you notice someone trying to steal your backpack.

outcomes.message: You shout and grab your bag. The thief runs off, but the confrontation leaves you shaken.
Your shouts attract attention. The thief flees, but some passersby look at you with suspicion.
You chase after them, eventually recovering your belongings, but you're exhausted.

housing_opportunity.title: Housing Program Opportunity
housing_opportunity.description: You learn about a new housing program accepting applications.

outcomes.message: You spend time filling out the application forms.

choices.text: Skip it - seems like too much hassle

outcomes.message: You decide not to apply.

shelter_full.title: Shelter is Full
shelter_full.description: You arrive at a shelter looking for a place to sleep, but they've reached capacity for the night.

outcomes.message: The staff suggests another shelter across town. You'll have to hurry to make it before they fill up too.

choices.text: Ask if you can at least stay in the lobby

outcomes.message: They allow you to sleep in a chair in the lobby. It's not comfortable, but it's better than outside.

choices.text: Leave and find a place outside

outcomes.message: You find a hidden spot to sleep rough. The night is cold and uncomfortable.

job_opportunity.title: Day Labor Opportunity
job_opportunity.description: A local business owner is looking for someone to help with a small job today.

outcomes.message: You spend the day working hard. The pay isn't much, but it's something, and the owner says they'll keep you in mind for future work.
You manage to negotiate a better rate. The work is tiring but rewarding.

choices.text: Decline, you need to focus on other priorities

outcomes.message: You thank them but explain you have other pressing matters to attend to today.

illness.title: Feeling Ill
illness.description: You wake up feeling feverish and weak. You might be coming down with something.

outcomes.message: You spend the day resting as much as possible. You feel slightly better by evening.

choices.text: Seek medical attention at a clinic

outcomes.message: The clinic provides basic treatment and some medication. It costs a little money, but you feel much better.
You push through the day despite feeling terrible. By evening, your condition has worsened.

outreach_worker.title: Outreach Worker
outreach_worker.description: A social worker from an outreach program approaches you and offers assistance.

choices.text: Accept help and discuss your situation

outcomes.message: You have a lengthy conversation about available resources. They give you a guide with helpful information and contacts.
They provide detailed information about housing programs and add your name to a waiting list for transitional housing.

choices.text: Thank them but decline assistance for now

outcomes.message: You're not ready to engage with services yet. They leave their contact information in case you change your mind.

found_clothing.title: Donation Bin
found_clothing.description: You notice a clothing donation bin. It might have something useful inside.

choices.text: Check if there are accessible donations

outcomes.message: You find some clean, warm clothes that fit you. Changing into them makes you feel much better.

choices.text: Try to reach inside the bin for more items

outcomes.message: You manage to retrieve both clothes and a blanket. These will be very useful.

choices.text: Leave it alone, it's not right to take from donations

outcomes.message: You decide not to take anything, maintaining your principles despite your needs.

found_money.title: Found Money
found_money.description: While walking down the street, you spot some money on the ground.

choices.text: Take it, you need it more than whoever lost it

outcomes.message: You pocket $10. It could make a real difference for your immediate needs.

choices.text: Look around to see if someone dropped it recently

outcomes.message: You look around but don't see an obvious owner. A passerby notices your honesty and gives you $5 as a reward.

choices.text: Leave it, it belongs to someone else

outcomes.message: Despite your own needs, you choose not to take what isn't yours. Your integrity remains intact.

gang_encounter.title: Gang Territory
gang_encounter.description: You've wandered into gang-controlled territory. A few tough-looking individuals approach you menacingly.

outcomes.message: You manage to slip away before the situation escalates.
They warn you to stay out of their territory but let you go this time.
The confrontation turns violent. You take a beating but manage to get away.

police_patrol.title: Police Patrol
police_patrol.description: A police patrol spots you in an area known for illegal activity.

outcomes.message: The officers question you but eventually let you go.
You manage to evade the patrol but they'll be looking for you now.
You run but they radio ahead. You'll need to lay low for a while.

shelter_bully.title: Shelter Conflict
shelter_bully.description: At the shelter, another resident is being aggressive and trying to intimidate others.

outcomes.message: You confront them and they eventually back down. Others appreciate your intervention but it was stressful.
Staff intervene and defuse the situation. They thank you for bringing it to their attention.

choices.text: Keep to yourself and avoid conflict

outcomes.message: You stay out of it, but have to remain vigilant which is tiring. The situation eventually calms down.

helpful_information.title: Local Knowledge
helpful_information.description: You meet someone who's been homeless in Ottawa for years and knows all the best spots and resources.

outcomes.message: They share detailed information about which places offer free meals on which days, and which dumpsters are safe to check.

choices.text: Ask about safe places to sleep

outcomes.message: They point out several hidden spots where police rarely check and you'll be safe from the elements.
They tell you about several programs you weren't aware of that might help you get back on your feet.

volunteer_opportunity.title: Volunteer Opportunity
volunteer_opportunity.description: A community center is looking for volunteers to help with an event. Volunteers will receive a meal and small stipend.

outcomes.message: You spend the day helping out. The work is tiring but rewarding, and you make some good connections.
You help for part of the day. It's a positive experience and you get a good meal.

choices.text: Decline and focus on other priorities

outcomes.message: You decide your time and energy is better spent elsewhere today.

winter_cold.title: Bitter Cold
winter_cold.description: The temperature has dropped dangerously low. Your current clothing isn't adequate for this weather.

outcomes.message: You struggle against the cold, desperately looking for somewhere warm.
You keep moving, hoping to generate enough body heat to survive.
You search for anything that might provide more insulation.

shelter_found.title: Emergency Shelter
shelter_found.description: You've managed to find an emergency warming center that's taking people in.

outcomes.message: The warmth is a welcome relief from the bitter cold.

found_clothing.title: Warm Layer Found
found_clothing.description: After searching desperately, you find a discarded winter coat in a donation bin. It's not in great condition, but it could save your life in this weather.

choices.text: Take the coat and put it on immediately

outcomes.message: The extra layer immediately helps against the biting cold. You can't believe your luck.
You decide to keep looking for something in better condition, but the continued exposure takes its toll.

hypothermia_risk.title: Dangerous Cold
hypothermia_risk.description: Your body temperature is dropping dangerously low.

outcomes.message: You realize you need to find shelter immediately.

blizzard_warning.title: Incoming Blizzard
blizzard_warning.description: Weather reports warn of a severe blizzard approaching the city.

outcomes.message: You spend time securing what you need and finding a safe place before the storm hits.
You work with others to ensure everyone has a safe place to weather the storm.
You spend hours moving between public buildings to stay warm. It's exhausting but keeps you from freezing.
Your extra layers provide crucial protection against the cold.

choices.text: Try to make it to a shelter

outcomes.message: You trek through the cold to reach a shelter. The journey is brutal, but you eventually find warmth.

panhandling.title: Asking for Help
panhandling.description: You're desperate for some money and consider asking passersby for spare change.

choices.text: Find a busy corner and ask politely

outcomes.message: After a few hours, you collect about $8. The experience is humbling but necessary.

choices.text: Create a sign explaining your situation

outcomes.message: Your honest sign resonates with some passersby. You collect about $12 over several hours.
You ask around for odd jobs instead of handouts. You don't make any money today, but make some potentially useful contacts.

library_resource.title: Library Opportunity
library_resource.description: While warming up in the public library, you notice they have free computer access and job resources.

choices.text: Use the computer to search for jobs

outcomes.message: You spend a few hours applying for jobs and researching opportunities. Your prospects are improving.
You discover several housing assistance programs you might qualify for and complete some online applications.
You take advantage of the comfortable environment to rest. It's a welcome break from the stress of the streets.

housing_application.title: Housing Application
housing_application.description: You've been notified that your application for subsidized housing is being reviewed. You need to attend an interview to complete the process.

outcomes.message: You spend time gathering documents and preparing answers to likely questions.
You decide to just be yourself and hope for the best.

housing_interview_success.title: Housing Interview
housing_interview_success.description: Your preparation pays off. The housing officer is impressed by your organization and commitment.

outcomes.message: You're offered a spot in a subsidized housing unit! It will take a security deposit, but you'll have stable housing.
They connect you with a program that can help with the security deposit, but it will take time to process.

housing_interview_challenge.title: Difficult Housing Interview
housing_interview_challenge.description: The housing officer seems skeptical about your application and asks for additional documentation you don't have ready.

choices.text: Ask for help getting the documents

outcomes.message: They refer you to a social worker who can help you obtain the necessary documents, though it will delay your application.
Your frustration shows, and the interview ends poorly. You'll need to start the application process over.

helping_others.title: Chance to Help
helping_others.description: You notice another homeless person struggling with their belongings and looking disoriented.

outcomes.message: You help them get situated and share some of your knowledge. The gratitude in their eyes gives you a sense of purpose.
You offer some of your food. They're deeply grateful, and helping someone else makes your own troubles seem more manageable.

choices.text: Keep to yourself, you have your own problems

outcomes.message: You decide you can't afford to help others when your own situation is so precarious.

public_shower.title: Shower Opportunity
public_shower.description: You discover that a community center offers free shower facilities for those in need.

outcomes.message: The hot shower feels incredible. You feel refreshed, clean, and more human.
After your shower, you speak with staff who provide information about other services that might help you.

choices.text: Skip it, you're too uncomfortable using public facilities

outcomes.message: You decide not to use the facilities this time, though you make note of their availability for the future.

community_garden.title: Community Garden
community_garden.description: You come across a community garden where volunteers are working.

choices.text: Offer to help in exchange for some produce

outcomes.message: You spend a couple hours helping weed and water. The volunteers share some fresh vegetables with you.

choices.text: Ask if they need regular volunteers

outcomes.message: The garden coordinator seems impressed by your initiative and mentions they could use regular help. This could develop into something more stable.
You watch the activity for a while but decide not to get involved today.

lost_tourist.title: Lost Tourist
lost_tourist.description: A tourist is looking confused at a map and clearly lost.

outcomes.message: You help them find their way to a popular attraction. They're grateful and offer you a small amount of money.

choices.text: Offer to show them the way personally

outcomes.message: You walk with them to their destination, providing local insights along the way. They appreciate your kindness and give you a generous tip.

choices.text: Ignore them, it's not your problem

outcomes.message: You keep to yourself and continue on your way.

life_turning_point.title: A Second Chance
life_turning_point.description: While at the community center, you discover a skills training program that could change everything. The coordinator seems genuinely interested in helping you.

choices.text: Commit to the program despite the challenges

outcomes.message: You sign up for the program. It will be tough, but this could be your path forward.

choices.text: Take the information but delay deciding

outcomes.message: You hold onto the brochure, but the weight of commitment feels too heavy right now.

job_interview.title: Job Interview
job_interview.description: A local store is hiring. They've agreed to interview you despite your situation.

choices.text: Dress your best and be honest about your situation

outcomes.message: The manager appreciates your honesty and says they'll consider you for a position.

choices.text: Make up a story about your background

outcomes.message: They seem to believe your story, but keeping up the lie might be stressful.

job_offer_honest.title: Job Offer
job_offer_honest.description: The store manager calls. They were impressed by your honesty and want to offer you a part-time position stocking shelves.

outcomes.message: You've got a job! It's only part-time, but it's a stable income and a huge step forward.
They can only offer part-time for now, but will keep you in mind if a full-time position opens up.

job_offer_lie.title: Reference Check
job_offer_lie.description: The store manager calls to say they're checking your references, but they're having trouble verifying some of your background information.

choices.text: Come clean and explain your situation

outcomes.message: The manager appreciates you coming clean but says they need reliable employees. They'll keep your application on file.
Your story falls apart under scrutiny. The manager says they can't hire someone they don't trust.

first_day_work.title: First Day on the Job
first_day_work.description: It's your first day working at the store. You're nervous but excited for this opportunity.

choices.text: Work extra hard to make a good impression

outcomes.message: You put in 110% effort. Your supervisor notices and is impressed by your work ethic.

choices.text: Take it easy and pace yourself

outcomes.message: You complete your assigned tasks adequately without overexerting yourself.

health_choice.title: Health Decision
health_choice.description: You're not feeling well. The clinic has a long wait but is free. The pharmacy has medicine but costs money.

outcomes.message: After hours of waiting, you receive proper treatment.
The medicine helps but was expensive.

id_quest_start.title: Lost Identification
id_quest_start.description: You realize you need ID to access many services and opportunities, but your identification was lost during your eviction.

choices.text: Try to remember where you last saw your ID

outcomes.message: You rack your brain but can't recall exactly what happened to your documents during the confusion of eviction.

choices.text: Ask at the social services office about replacing ID

outcomes.message: You learn that replacing ID is possible but requires other forms of identification you don't currently have.

id_quest_services.title: ID Replacement Process
id_quest_services.description: The social worker explains the complex process for replacing your identification without having other forms of ID.

choices.text: Work with the social worker on the application

outcomes.message: The social worker helps you fill out forms and explains that you'll need to get affidavits from people who can verify your identity.

choices.text: It seems too complicated right now

outcomes.message: The process feels overwhelming. You'll need to come back when you have more resources and energy.

id_quest_memory.title: Memory Breakthrough
id_quest_memory.description: Suddenly you remember - your former landlord might have kept your belongings, including the box with your documents.

choices.text: Try to contact your former landlord

outcomes.message: You manage to leave a message with the landlord's office. Now you have to wait and see if they respond.
You decide it's better not to rely on someone who evicted you. You'll need to find another way.

id_quest_landlord_response.title: Landlord's Call
id_quest_landlord_response.description: Your former landlord calls back. They do have a box of your belongings in storage, including what might be your ID documents.

choices.text: Arrange to pick up your belongings

outcomes.message: You make the trek across town and recover your documents! Having your ID will make many things easier.

choices.text: Ask if they can mail the documents

outcomes.message: They agree to mail just the documents if you pay for postage. You'll need to wait a few days.

id_quest_affidavits.title: Finding Witnesses
id_quest_affidavits.description: You need to find people who can verify your identity to complete the ID application process.

outcomes.message: After several attempts, you manage to reach a former supervisor who agrees to sign an affidavit.

choices.text: Ask outreach workers who know you

outcomes.message: The shelter staff who have been working with you agree to provide the necessary documentation.

id_quest_completion.title: ID Application Submitted
id_quest_completion.description: With all the necessary documentation gathered, you submit your application for replacement identification.

outcomes.message: You pay extra to speed up the process. Your new ID should be ready within a week.
You opt for the free standard processing. It will take 3-4 weeks, but you've managed the hardest part of the process.

busker_territory.title: Busker Territory Dispute
busker_territory.description: A street performer confronts you about occupying their usual spot.

outcomes.message: You find another spot, though less ideal.
Your suggestion leads to an impromptu dual performance.

bakery_opportunity.title: Bakery Closing Time
bakery_opportunity.description: A bakery employee is about to dispose of the day's unsold goods.

outcomes.message: They kindly give you some pastries.
You retrieve more food but it's less dignified.

shelter_politics.title: Shelter Power Dynamic
shelter_politics.description: You notice a group of regulars controlling access to the best sleeping spots.

outcomes.message: Standing up to them earns respect but creates tension.
You gradually gain support from others in similar situations.

community_fridge.title: Hidden Community Fridge
community_fridge.description: You discover a community fridge tucked behind a local church.

outcomes.message: You find some fresh food and take a reasonable amount.
Helping organize the fridge earns goodwill from volunteers.

apartment_opportunity.title: Apartment Building Access
apartment_opportunity.description: A resident holds the door open, giving temporary access to the building's facilities.

outcomes.message: You manage to wash your clothes, significantly improving your hygiene.

choices.text: Find a warm spot to rest

outcomes.message: You find a quiet corner in the stairwell for a brief rest.

art_space_connection.title: Art Space Discovery
art_space_connection.description: An art gallery is hosting a free community event with food and warmth.

outcomes.message: Creating art proves therapeutic and engaging.
Staff appreciate the help and share leftover refreshments.

stadium_event.title: Stadium Event Opportunity
stadium_event.description: A major event at TD Place is ending, creating opportunities for bottle collection.

outcomes.message: Your organized approach yields good results.
You find substantial leftover food being discarded.

winter_crisis.title: Winter Storm Crisis
winter_crisis.description: A severe snowstorm has hit the city, making survival critically important.

outcomes.message: You make it to an emergency warming center.
You manage to create a sheltered space from the storm.
